channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lovelace Road SE21 at the side of 24 Thurlow Hill the, 29th July
item.description:
Lovelace Road SE21 at the side of 24 Thurlow Hill there is a Lambeth green plastic type surface bicycle secure locking ‘shed’ which has been graffiti tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com report to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview link: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4402756,-0.1002392,3a,75y,140.09h,68.19t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sLMMHxGvBpDOvnCJp6JVItQ!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D21.806532802661025%26panoid%3DLMMHxGvBpDOvnCJp6JVItQ%26yaw%3D140.0878835445618!7i16384!8i8192?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDcyMy4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lovelace Road, Tulse Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rottting food from flytipped freezer all over pavement and road, 29th July
item.description:
A freezer had been flytipped yesterday: it’s now gone but left behind are the food contents and liquids that presumably had been inside the freezer. The litter is causing a foul rotting stench on the street and inside our building

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Monteagle Way, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree branches intefering with telephone wire, 29th July
item.description:
The tree outside no. 6 bourdon road is well overdue a pruning to stop it intefering with telephone wires and to slow its root growth which is making the pavement difficult to navigate for us. The last pruning did not cut back far enough to keep the tree to a reasonable size.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bourdon Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet
